import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import ConnectComponent from '@/connect' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import Alert from '@/components/alert' import Loader from '@/components/loader' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button/index' import { GetCampaign } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/emailCampaign' import { SendCampaign } from '@/actions/utils' class StepFive extends Component { state = { campaignId: '', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], } componentWillMount() { const { params: { campaignId }, } = this.props.match this.setState({ campaignId, }) if (!this.props.CreateCampaign.data) { GetCampaign(campaignId) } } sendCampaign = async () => { const { campaignId } = this.state const response = await SendCampaign({ campaignId: parseInt(campaignId, 10) }) } render() { const { steps, campaignId } = this.state const { CreateCampaign } = this.props if (CreateCampaign.loading) { return } return ( {CreateCampaign.error && Error: {CreateCampaign.error}}
Campaign Details
Edit
Campaign Name
: value
Send TO
: abc@gmail.com
From TO
: def@gmail.com
Reply TO
: chahanatyagi16@gmail.com
Scheduling
Edit
Segmentation
Edit
Send Test Notification
Send Save as Draft ) } } export default ConnectComponent(StepFive)
